register.title: Welcome to SpotlightSarajevo!
register.sectionDescription: Where all events, spots and iconic moments are collected together! Please register Your account to use the Application
register.categorySectionDescription: Now, to better enhance Your experience, tell us which spots You like to visit the most. Select three categories that match Your vibe.
register.categorySectionEventsDescription: Lovely choices! Now, it's time to do the same for events. Select three categories that match Your vibe.
register.surveyDescription: We're almost done! Before finishing, please answer just a couple of questions for us to better uderstand who the users of our application are!
register.finalDescription: Countless events and spots are waiting to be discovered! We wish You the best experience @ SpotlightSarajevo!

homepage.headerSubtitle: An overview of recent happenings, Your favourites and headline events!

discover.headerSubtitle: Discover the most popular spots & upcoming events!
discover.popularTitle: These are the top rated & popular spots in Sarajevo
discover.favouriteSpotsTitle: Based on Your favourite locals & spots!
